title: A-PAD coordinated medicine donation to MoH
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st);The Asia Pacific Alliance for Disaster Management coordinated the provision of vital and essential medicine to the Ministry of Health (MoH).
A-PAD Sri Lanka had secured pharmaceuticals amidst high demand and existential shortage of goods in the market.
Medication administered worth over a sum of Rs. 10 million was officially handed over to Ministry of Health.
These medicines were prioritized from the vital and essential medicines listed out by the Ministry of Health.
Over $330 Mn dollars received to buy medicine, but not disbursed properly – COPE
SLPP MPs Milan Jayathilake, Sanath Nishantha further remanded over attacks on #GotaGoGama & #MynaGoGama
Russia says it’s completed testing of hypersonic Zircon cruise missile
